testimonials.title: What Our Pilgrims Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real experiences from travelers who chose Jannat Travels for their journey
testimonials.testimonial1Text: An absolutely wonderful experience. Jannat Travels took care of every detail of our Hajj journey. The guides were knowledgeable and the accommodations were excellent.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: Our family Umrah trip was perfectly organized. From visa assistance to hotel bookings, everything was seamless. Highly recommended!
testimonials.testimonial3Text: The Ziyarat tour was spiritually enriching. Our guide shared beautiful stories about each holy site. A truly memorable experience.

about.heroTitle: Your Spiritual Journey, Our Sacred Duty
about.storyTitle: A Legacy of Trust and Excellence
about.storyP1: Founded in 2009, Jannat Travels and Tours began with a simple yet profound mission: to make the sacred pilgrimage journey accessible, comfortable, and spiritually enriching for Muslims around the world.
about.storyP2: Based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, we have grown from a small family operation to one of the most trusted travel companies in the region. Our deep understanding of the spiritual significance of Hajj and Umrah, combined with our commitment to excellence, has helped us serve over 50,000 pilgrims.
about.storyP3: Today, we offer comprehensive travel solutions including Hajj packages, Umrah tours, Ziyarat experiences, local Saudi adventures, and international holiday packages—all delivered with the same dedication and care that defined our humble beginnings.
about.missionDesc: To provide exceptional pilgrimage and travel experiences that honor the spiritual significance of sacred journeys while ensuring comfort, safety, and peace of mind for every traveler who entrusts us with their journey.
about.visionDesc: To be the most trusted and preferred travel partner for pilgrims and travelers worldwide, setting the standard for excellence in religious tourism and creating transformative travel experiences that inspire and uplift.
about.valuesSubtitle: The principles that guide everything we do
about.trustDesc: Building lasting relationships through reliability and honesty
about.transparencyDesc: Clear communication and no hidden costs in any service
about.careDesc: Treating every pilgrim like family with personalized attention
about.excellenceDesc: Striving for the highest standards in every journey
about.journeySubtitle: Key moments in our story of service and excellence
about.foundationDesc: Jannat Travels established in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia
about.digitalDesc: Launched online booking and virtual consultation

services.sectionTitle: Everything You Need for Your Journey
services.sectionSubtitle: From pilgrimage packages to travel essentials, we've got you covered
services.hajjUmrahDesc: Comprehensive pilgrimage packages with premium accommodations near Haram, guided tours, and spiritual support throughout your sacred journey.
services.flightBookingDesc: Best deals on international and domestic flights with flexible booking options and dedicated support for changes and cancellations.
services.hotelReservationsDesc: Access to premium hotels worldwide with exclusive rates, especially for properties near holy sites in Makkah and Madinah.
services.visaAssistanceDesc: Complete visa processing services for Saudi Arabia and international destinations with high success rates and quick turnaround.
services.transportationDesc: Comfortable and reliable ground transportation services including airport transfers, city tours, and inter-city travel.
services.travelInsuranceDesc: Comprehensive travel insurance coverage for medical emergencies, trip cancellations, and lost luggage for peace of mind.
services.groupCorporateDesc: Customized group travel packages for families, organizations, and corporate teams with special rates and dedicated coordinators.
services.eventPlanningDesc: Special occasion travel planning including weddings, anniversaries, and milestone celebrations with personalized touches.

hajjPage.heroDesc: Fulfill your sacred obligation with our comprehensive Hajj packages, designed for comfort, convenience, and spiritual enrichment.
hajjPage.chooseSubtitle: Select the package that best suits your needs and budget

hajjPage.accommodationTitle: Stay in Comfort Near the Holy Sites
hajjPage.accommodationDesc: We partner with the best hotels in Makkah and Madinah to ensure you have a comfortable stay close to the holy mosques. Our accommodations are carefully selected for their proximity, cleanliness, and service quality.

packagesPage.noPackages: No packages found matching your criteria.

faq.q1: What is included in your Umrah packages?
faq.a1: Our Umrah packages typically include visa processing, round-trip transportation, hotel accommodation near Haram, guided Ziyarat tours, and dedicated assistance throughout your spiritual journey.
faq.q2: Do you provide Hajj packages for all categories?
faq.a2: Yes. We offer economical, standard, and luxury Hajj packages, covering accommodation, transportation, Mina–Arafat services, meals, and experienced group guides in accordance with Saudi regulations.
faq.q3: How early should I book Umrah or Hajj?
faq.a3: For Umrah, booking 4–6 weeks in advance is recommended. Hajj packages should be booked several months earlier due to limited quotas and high demand.
faq.q4: Is Saudi Umrah visa included in the package?
faq.a4: Yes. We handle complete Umrah visa processing, documentation, and approvals as part of our Umrah packages.
faq.q5: Do you arrange hotels near Haram in Makkah and Madinah?
faq.a5: Absolutely. We provide carefully selected hotels at walking distance or with shuttle services, depending on the chosen package.
faq.a6: Yes. Our packages include guided Ziyarat tours in Makkah and Madinah, covering important Islamic historical sites.
faq.q7: Do you offer family and group packages?
faq.a7: Yes. We specialize in family, group, and elderly-friendly packages with customized arrangements.
faq.a8: We offer optional tours to destinations like Taif, Abha, AlUla, and Riyadh as add-ons to Umrah or separate tour packages.
